contents.text: Welcome to GitLab, based in San Francisco, the single application for the entire DevOps lifecycle.
For sales inquiries and product information, press 1.
For enterprise licensing and quotes, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Get a quote for GitLab Enterprise licensing and pricing options.
Ask about enterprise pricing for my veteran-led non-profit project and available veteran discounts
I’d like to request pricing and enterprise licensing options for a self-hosted GitLab deployment.
I need help getting a quote for an enterprise GitLab license.
Request an academic licensing quote for hosting GitLab in my university’s physics research lab

contents.text: For product demonstrations and onboarding, press 2.
One moment please while we transfer you to our onboarding team.

navigationGoals: Schedule a GitLab product demo and onboarding session for my team.
Request a product demo and onboarding session for my charity’s development team
I want to schedule a GitLab CI/CD platform demo and onboarding session.
I’d like a demo and assistance to get started with GitLab.
Arrange a product demonstration and onboarding tutorial for my student research group

contents.text: For technical support and customer service, press 2.
For developer tool support and issue reporting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a technical support engineer.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot and resolve a CI/CD pipeline error in my GitLab project.
Report a failing CI/CD pipeline on merge requests and get help from a technical support engineer
I need to report a GitLab API integration bug to a technical support engineer.
I’m having trouble with my GitLab tools and need technical support.
Seek assistance fixing a CI pipeline failure in my physics simulation repository

contents.text: For account management, billing, and license renewals, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing and account team.

navigationGoals: Renew my GitLab subscription and update billing details.
Renew my organization’s GitLab license, confirm billing charges, and apply any veteran discounts
I want to renew my GitLab subscription and update my billing information.
I need assistance renewing my license and updating my billing information.
Clarify billing charges and renew my academic subscription for GitLab
